transcript: were of the same age and both handsome fellows, though not alike. Boris was tall and fair, and his calm and handsome face had regular, delicate fea- tures. Nicholas was short with curly hair and an open expression. Dark hairs were already showing on his upper lip, and his whole face expressed impetuosity and enthusiasm. Nicho- las blushed when he entered the drawingroom. He evidently tried to find something to say, but failed. Boris on the contrary at once found his footing, and related quietl
